name: Pasta Con Broccoli
author: Pasta House

ingredients.name: cup thinly sliced fresh button mushroom

instructions: 1 - Cook pasta until half done (about 4 minutes); drain. Return pasta to the pot. 2 - Add cream, butter, garlic, tomato sauce, broccoli, salt and pepper. Bring to a hard boil. 3 - When noodles are fully cooked and sauce is starting to thicken, add mushrooms and stir to combine. 4 - Remove from the heat; add cheese. 5 - Toss and serve
